mesadc32.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*********************************************************************
00002   Name:         mesadc32.c
00003   Created by:   
00004 
00005   Contents:     MESADC32 32ch 11..13bit Peak sensing ADC
00006  
00007   $Id: mesadc32.c 5177 2011-08-12 02:26:08Z amaudruz $
00008 *********************************************************************/
00009 #include <stdio.h>
00010 #include <stdint.h>
00011 #include <string.h>
00012 #include "mesadc32drv.h"
00013 #include "mvmestd.h"
00014 
00015 /*****************************************************************/
00016 /*
00017 Read MESADC32 register value
00018 */
00019 static uint32_t regReadReg(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00020 {
00021   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00022   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00023   return mvme_read_value(mvme, base + offset);
00024 }
00025 
00026 /*****************************************************************/
00027 /*
00028 Write MESADC32 register value
00029 */
00030 static void regWriteReg(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00031 {
00032   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00033   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00034   mvme_write_value(mvme, base + offset, value);
00035 }
00036 
00037 /*****************************************************************/
00038 /*
00039   Read MESADC32 register value
00040 */
00041 int mesadc32_ReadData(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdata, int *nw32)
00042 {
00043   int i;
00044   *nw32 = regReadReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_BUF_DATA_LEN);
00045   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00046   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00047   if (*nw32) {
00048     for (i=0 ; i<*nw32 ; i++) {
00049       *pdata = mvme_read_value(mvme, base + MESADC32_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER);
00050       pdata++;
00051     }
00052     return 0;
00053   }
00054   return MESADC32_EMPTY;
00055 }
00056 
00057 /* User calls */
00058 /*****************************************************************/
00059 uint32_t mesadc32_RegisterRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00060 {
00061   return regReadReg(mvme, base, offset);
00062 }
00063 
00064 /*****************************************************************/
00065 void mesadc32_RegisterWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00066 {
00067   regWriteReg(mvme, base, offset, value);
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*****************************************************************/
00071 void mesadc32_Reset(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00072 {
00073   regWriteReg(mvme, base, 0, 0);
00074 }
00075 
00076 /*****************************************************************/
00077 void mesadc32_ResolutionSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t resolution)
00078 {
00079   uint32_t reg;
00080 
00081   reg = MESADC32_ADC_RESOLUTION;
00082   if ((resolution >= 0) && (resolution <=4))
00083     regWriteReg(mvme, base, reg, resolution);
00084   else
00085     printf("Resolution out of range (%d)\n", resolution);
00086   return;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*****************************************************************/
00090 void mesadc32_ThresholdSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t thres)
00091 {
00092   uint32_t reg;
00093 
00094   if (thres > 0x1FFF) {
00095     printf("Threshold, channel out of range (%d)\n", channel);
00096   } else if (channel < MESADC32_MAX_CHANNELS) {
00097     reg = MESADC32_THRESHOLD_0 + 2*channel;
00098     regWriteReg(mvme, base, reg, thres);
00099   } else
00100     printf("Threshold, channel out of range (%d)\n", channel);
00101   return;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*****************************************************************/
00105 void mesadc32_ThresholdGet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t *thres)
00106 {
00107   uint32_t reg;
00108 
00109   if (channel < MESADC32_MAX_CHANNELS) {
00110     reg = MESADC32_THRESHOLD_0 + 2*channel;
00111     *thres = regReadReg(mvme, base, reg);
00112   }
00113   else
00114     printf("Threshold, channel out of range (%d)\n", channel);
00115   return;
00116 }

00139 
00140 /*****************************************************************/
00141 int rcWait(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t modAdd, int timeout) 
00142 {
00143   uint16_t reg;
00144 
00145   do {
00146     reg = regReadReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_SENT_RTN_STAT);
00147     ss_sleep(1); // >100us
00148   } while ((timeout--) && (reg & 0x1));
00149   if (timeout == 0) {
00150     printf("Timeout to the MSCF16 %d\n", modAdd);
00151     if (reg & 0x2) printf("address collision\n");
00152     if (reg & 0x4) printf("any collision (no termination?)\n");
00153     if (reg & 0x8) printf("no response from the bus (no valid address?)\n");
00154     // Deactivate control bus
00155     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00156     return -1;
00157   }
00158   return 0;
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*****************************************************************/
00162 uint32_t mesadc32_MSCF16_IDC(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t modAdd)
00163 {
00164   uint16_t reg;
00165   // Activate control bus
00166   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x3);
00167   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00168   // Get Module ID-Code (should read 20 for the MSCF16
00169   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_MODNUM, modAdd);
00170   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00171   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_OPCODE, 6);
00172   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00173   // Init send request
00174   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA, 0);
00175   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00176   if (rcWait(mvme, base, modAdd, 10)) return -1;
00177   reg = regReadReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA);
00178   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00179   //  if (reg & 0x1) printf("RC status ON  ");
00180   //  else           printf("RC status OFF ");
00181   //  printf("ID-Code : %d [0x%x]\n", ((reg>>1) & 0x7F), reg);
00182   //  if (((reg>>1) & 0x7F)) retsta = 0;
00183   // Deactivate control bus
00184   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00185   return reg;
00186 }
00187 
00188 /*****************************************************************/
00189 uint32_t mesadc32_MSCF16_GainSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t modAdd, int subAdd, int data)
00190 {
00191   uint32_t reg;
00192   // Activate control bus
00193   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x3);
00194   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00195   // Get Module ID-Code (should read 20 for the MSCF16
00196   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_MODNUM, modAdd);
00197   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00198   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_OPCODE, 16);
00199   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00200   // Write sub first address 
00201   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_ADDRESS, subAdd);
00202   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00203   // Write sub last address
00204   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA, data);
00205   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00206   if (rcWait(mvme, base, modAdd, 10)) return -1;
00207   reg = regReadReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA);
00208   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00209   if (reg == data) {
00210     //    printf("Set Gain complete for ID:%d sub:%d data:%d\n",modAdd, subAdd, data);
00211     // deactivate control bus
00212     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00213     return 0;
00214   } else {
00215     printf("Set Gain failed for ID:%d  sub:%d data:%d [%d]\n",modAdd, subAdd, data, reg);
00216     // deactivate control bus
00217     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00218     return -1;
00219   }
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 /*****************************************************************/
00224 uint32_t mesadc32_MSCF16_GainGet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t modAdd, int subAdd, uint32_t *data)
00225 {
00226   // Activate control bus
00227   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x3);
00228   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00229   // Get Module ID-Code (should read 20 for the MSCF16
00230   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_MODNUM, modAdd);
00231   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00232   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_OPCODE, 18);
00233   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00234   // Write sub first address 
00235   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_ADDRESS, subAdd);
00236   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00237   // Write sub last address
00238   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA, 0);
00239   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00240   if (rcWait(mvme, base, modAdd, 10)) return -1;
00241   *data = regReadReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_DATA);
00242   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00243   // deactivate control bus
00244   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00245   return 0;
00246 }
00247 
00248 /*****************************************************************/
00249 uint32_t mesadc32_MSCF16_RCon(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t modAdd)
00250 {
00251   // Activate control bus
00252   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x3);
00253   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00254   // Get Module ID-Code (should read 20 for the MSCF16
00255   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_MODNUM, modAdd);
00256   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00257   // Active RC 
00258   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RC_OPCODE, 3);
00259   ss_sleep(1); // >400us
00260   // deactive control bus
00261   regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_NIM_BUSY, 0x0);
00262   return 0;
00263 }
00264 
00265 /*****************************************************************/
00266 void  mesadc32_Status(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00267 {
00268   printf("================================================\n");
00269   printf("MESADC32 at A32 0x%x\n", (int)base);
00270   // printf("Board ID             : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, MESADC32_BOARD_ID));
00271   printf("FW revision          : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_FIRM_REV));
00272   printf("Data format          : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_DATA_LEN_FMT));
00273   printf("Multi Event mode     : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_MULTIEVENT));
00274   printf("EndOfEvent marker    : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_MARKING_TYPE));
00275   printf("ADC Resolution mode  : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_ADC_RESOLUTION));
00276   printf("ADC Input range      : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_INPUT_RANGE));
00277   printf("Test Pulse setting   : 0x%x\n", regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_TESTPULSER));
00278   // printf("Acquisition status   : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, MESADC32_ACQUISITION_STATUS));
00279   printf("================================================\n");
00280 }
00281 
00282 /*****************************************************************/
00283 /**
00284 Sets all the necessary paramters for a given configuration.
00285 The configuration is provided by the mode argument.
00286 Add your own configuration in the case statement. Let me know
00287 your setting if you want to include it in the distribution.
00288 - <b>Mode 1</b> : 
00289 
00290 @param *mvme VME structure
00291 @param  base Module base address
00292 @param mode  Configuration mode number
00293 @return 0: OK. -1: Bad
00294 */
00295 int  mesadc32_Setup(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int mode)
00296 {
00297   WORD reg;
00298 
00299   switch (mode) {
00300   case 0x0:
00301     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00302     printf("Setup Skip\n");
00303     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00304     break;
00305   case 0x1:
00306     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00307     printf("Standard Setup\n");
00308     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00309     // Stop acquisition (0x603A W=0)
00310     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_START_ACQ, 0);
00311     
00312     // Module address (0x6000 W=1), (0x6002 W=add)
00313 
00314     // Soft reset to restore defaults (0x6008 W=0)
00315     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_SOFT_RESET, 0);
00316 
00317     // Module ID in the Header (0x6004 W=0x01..0x0y)
00318 
00319     // Read firmware revision (0x600E R=0x01.10)
00320     reg = regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_FIRM_REV);
00321     printf("FW rev: %x\n", reg);
00322 
00323     // Set data length format (0x6032 W=2) D32
00324     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_DATA_LEN_FMT, 2);
00325     
00326     // Set multievent off, (0X6036 w=0) use 0x6034 for enable next event
00327     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_MULTIEVENT, 0);
00328 
00329     // Enable EoE marker for time stamp (0x6038 W=1)
00330     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_MARKING_TYPE, 1);
00331 
00332     // Set adc resolution (0x6042 W=0[2K])
00333     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_ADC_RESOLUTION, 0);
00334 
00335     // Gate Generator 0, 1 default d20/w50
00336     // Input range (0x6060 W=0 0..4V input)
00337     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_INPUT_RANGE, 0);
00338 
00339     // CTRA 00: (0x6069 W'00:VME frq, external reset disable)
00340     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_TS_SOURCE, 0);
00341     
00342     // CTRA  Reset all counters (0x6090 W 1)
00343     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_RESET_CTL_AB, 1);
00344     // NIM gate1 (0x606A W=0),
00345     // NIM Fast Reset 
00346 
00347     // Reset (0x6034)
00348     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_READOUT_RESET, 0);
00349 
00350     // Start acquisition (0x603A W=1)
00351     regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_START_ACQ, 1);
00352 
00353     // Read buffer data length (0x6030)
00354     reg = regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_BUF_DATA_LEN);
00355     printf("Data in Fifo: %x\n", reg);
00356 
00357     // Read Data ready (0x603E R==1)
00358     reg = regReadReg (mvme, base, MESADC32_DATA_READY);
00359     printf("Data ready: %i\n", reg);
00360 
00361     // After reading the Fifo (0x0000) 
00362     // Issue the MESADC32_READOUT_RESET to allow new event
00363     // Reset (0x6034)
00364     // regWriteReg(mvme, base, MESADC32_READOUT_RESET, 0);
00365 
00366     break;
00367   default:
00368     printf("Unknown setup mode\n");
00369     return -1;
00370   }
00371   mesadc32_Status(mvme, base);
00372   return 0;
00373 }
00374 
00375 /*****************************************************************/
00376 /*-PAA- For test purpose only */
00377 #ifdef MAIN_ENABLE
00378 int main (int argc, char* argv[]) {
00379 
00380   uint32_t MESADC32_BASE  = 0x10000000;
00381   uint32_t data[1000];
00382   int i, status, reg;
00383   MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00384 
00385   //  uint32_t data[100000], n32word, n32read;
00386   //  int status, channel, i, j, nchannels=0, chanmask;
00387 
00388   if (argc>1) {
00389     sscanf(argv[1],"%x", &MESADC32_BASE);
00390   }
00391 
00392   // Test under vmic
00393   status = mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00394 
00395   mesadc32_Setup(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, 1);
00396 
00397   for (i=0;i<16;i++) {
00398     status = mesadc32_MSCF16_IDC(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, i);
00399     if (status > 0) printf("MSCF16[%d]: RC-bus:%d - ID_Code:%d\n", i, status & 0x1, ((status>>1)&0x7f));
00400   }
00401   printf("\n");
00402 
00403   for (i=0;i<32;i++) {
00404     mesadc32_ThresholdSet(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, i, 1360);
00405     mesadc32_ThresholdGet(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, i, &(data[0]));
00406     printf("Threshold: 0, ch:%i Data:0x%x (0x%x)\n", i, data[0], status);
00407   }
00408   
00409   for (i=0;i<16;i++) {
00410     status = mesadc32_MSCF16_GainSet(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, 1, i, 2*i);
00411     printf("Gain Mod: 0, ch:%i Data:0x%x (0x%x)\n", i, 2*i, status);
00412   }
00413   printf("\n");
00414 
00415   for (i=0;i<16;i++) {
00416     status = mesadc32_MSCF16_GainGet(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, 1, i, &(data[0]));
00417     printf("Gain Mod: 0, ch:%i Data:0x%x (0x%x)\n", i, data[0], status);
00418   }
00419 
00420   // CTRA  Reset all counters (0x6090 W 1)
00421   mesadc32_RegisterWrite(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_TS_DIVIDER, 10000);
00422   mesadc32_RegisterWrite(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_RESET_CTL_AB, 1);
00423   mesadc32_RegisterWrite(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_TESTPULSER, 0x6);
00424   for (;;){
00425     do {
00426       //    mesadc32_Status(myvme, MESADC32_BASE);
00427       // Read buffer data length (0x6030)
00428       reg = mesadc32_RegisterRead(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_BUF_DATA_LEN);
00429     } while (reg==0);
00430     if (reg) {
00431       printf("Data in Fifo: 0x%x\n", reg);
00432       reg = 0;
00433       mesadc32_ReadData(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, &(data[0]), &reg);
00434       for (i=0;i<reg;i++) {
00435         printf("Data[%2.2i]:0x%08x\n", i, data[i]);
00436       } 
00437       // Reset (0x6034)
00438       mesadc32_RegisterWrite(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_READOUT_RESET, 0);
00439     }
00440   }
00441   /*
00442   do {
00443     status = regRead(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_ACQUISITION_STATUS);
00444     printf("Acq Status1:0x%x\n", status);
00445   } while ((status & 0x8)==0);
00446   
00447   n32read = mesadc32_dataRead(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00448   printf("n32read:%d\n", n32read);
00449   
00450   for (i=0; i<n32read;i+=4) {
00451     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00452            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00453   }
00454   
00455   do {
00456     status = regRead(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, MESADC32_ACQUISITION_STATUS);
00457     printf("Acq Status2:0x%x\n", status);
00458   } while ((status & 0x8)==0);
00459   
00460   n32read = mesadc32_dataRead(myvme, MESADC32_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00461   printf("n32read:%d\n", n32read);
00462   
00463   for (i=0; i<n32read;i+=4) {
00464     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00465            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00466   }
00467   */
00468   
00469   
00470   status = mvme_close(myvme);
00471 
00472   return 1;
